summary: Alien vs. Preditor weapons and armor
descriptionHtml:
this mod gives you wepons and armor from the preditor movies

weapons included are:
Wrist Blades
Plasma Cannon(staff)
Combi Stick (arrows)
smart disc (throwable)
trip mine (works like fire rune)

Armors included are:
all three masks from the movie preditors
the armor the preditors wear
the armor that the enginers wear in prometheus
author: DeBossMan
